bibl.title: Sappho, Herodotus, and the Hetaira.
bibl.note: The story about Sappho, her brother Charaxus and the slave-prostitute Rhodopis called Doricha by Sappho. - 1. Compiling the Evidence. - 2. Herodotus: Pyramids and Prostitutes. - 3. Rhodopis in Strabo and in Hellenistic Scholarship. - 4. Sappho and Charaxus in Athenaeus and in the Later Tradition. - 5. Doricha: The Testimony of Posidippus. - 6. Doricha and Charaxus in the Poems of Sappho. - 7. Sappho and Rhodopis in Athens? - 8. The Songs of Sappho. - Literature Cited.
